response.overview: Featuring the unparalleled tenor voice of David Phelps, this world-class Christmas event celebrates the majesty of the Savior s birth and the joy of the season. Featuring something for everyone in the family, this DVD collection offers a dazzling array of Christmas standards, nostalgic seasonal favorites, and power-packed anthems sung only as David can sing them.  INCLUDING: 1. Angel Lullaby,  2. Tonight, 3. Joy To The World, 4. Ave Maria, 5. O Little Town Of Bethlehem, 6. Jesus, What A Wonderful Child, 7. Don't Save It All For Christmas Day, 8. Santa Clause Tonight, 9. My Favorite Things, 10. Blue Christmas, 11. Santa Clause, Get Well Soon, 12. The Christmas Song / I'll Be Home For Christmas, 13. To Make A King, 14. Joy, Joy, 15. Let The Glory Come Down
response.title: Christmas with David Phelps
